Test Name: Homocysteine (Total), Methylmalonic Acid, and Methylcitric Acid
Purpose: To generate accurate, reliable, and documented quantitative results for Homocysteine (Total), Methylmalonic Acid, and Methylcitric Acid from dried blood spot specimens.
Equipment: High-Performance Liquid Chromatography (HPLC) system or Tandem Mass Spectrometer (MS/MS), microplate reader, incubators, centrifuge, pipettes, sonicator
